heading: Your best foot forward
summary: Shoe racks at favorite stores may look familiar this spring, as the gladiator sandal endures the test of time (appropriately). But South Floridians find even more reason to love this trend – it's wearable year-round. And, by choosing a neutral hue, shoppers can transition looks from season to season.
